entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -39.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -39.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -56
Dewpoint: -44.2°C
Wind: NW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 42. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill near minus 58. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 36. Wind chill minus 55 in the morning and minus 49 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 50 in the evening and minus 57 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
